data.name: Greater Health Potion
data.description: Restores 80HP at the start of the turn if the player has lost more than 50% of his health points.

data.name: Sanguine Edge of Rosen
data.description: Commemorative weapon in honor of Rosenstjerne. First player to drop an artifact in the game.

data.name: Rosenblood Elixir
data.description: Gives 20% resistance in all elements at the start of fight.

data.name: Health Boost Potion
data.description: Gives 150HP at the start of the fight.

data.name: Enchanted Health Potion
data.description: Restores 100HP at the start of the turn if the player has lost more than 50% of his health points.

data.name: Enchanted Boost Potion
data.description: Gives 20% damage in all elements at the start of fight.
